title: Trump Revokes Executive Order on Competition
summary: President Trump signs executive order revoking previous competition and antitrust enforcement policies, clearing path for increased corporate consolidation and monopolistic practices without federal oversight.

sources.title: Trump revokes Biden antitrust EO targeting monopolies
FTC Chairman Applauds Revocation of Biden-Harris Executive Order on Competition
Trump Revokes Biden Administration's Executive Order on Antitrust & Competition

notes: Removes barriers to corporate mergers and acquisitions, enables unchecked market concentration
